We re introducing new ways to keep your phone number private on Signal. Your phone number will no longer be visible to anyone on the latest version of Signal unless they have it saved in their phone s contacts. You can change this in Settings. You can now set and share an optional username to let people chat with you without giving them your phone number. A new privacy setting lets you control who can find you by your phone number on Signal.

We fixed a bug that caused muted chats that were marked as unread to still appear in the unread total on the Signal icon even when that setting was disabled. Now the badge count consistently ignores any conversations that you choose to consistently ignore. This update also enables VoiceOver support for message reactions stickers and wallpaper color selections.

Silence isn t always golden but it does have a new icon. We updated the Camera and Mute buttons in voice and video calls so it s even easier to see when they are enabled or disabled. There might already be a self referential German word to describe German words that are so big they won t fit on a single line but we fixed the lost cursor bug that was affecting some long German words on iOS 17.

This update fixes a rare keyboard bug that sometimes caused the app to crash. Even though this bug almost never happened we believe that keyboards should only crash if you play the right note in the sound effect mode on an old synthesizer.

In the halcyon world of user interface design a toast is a tiny status message that briefly appears on the screen. After removing a contact in Signal sometimes the confirmation message would get partially covered up by the keyboard like a piece of toast stuck in the toaster . If you re on iOS 15 please raise a glass and toast to never seeing that bug again. Cheers! We also fixed a couple of broken animations in chats with a custom background.

We ve added a new way to keep your Signal contacts nice and tidy. This Halloween season remove the ghost of an old contact by long pressing on their name in the contact list on the New Chat screen and selecting the Remove option.

We fixed a bug that sometimes caused re registration to get stuck at 99 which was 100 annoying if it happened to you. Thanks to everyone who helped us troubleshoot this problem. We would also like to thank ovakisan on GitHub for helping us reproduce and fix a crash that was occurring with some image attachments.
We told ourselves that we would never do this that we wouldn t be like the other apps with their lazy release notes but this update really does include bug fixes and performance improvements.

We added an iconic new way to customize the look of Signal. Choose from a fun selection of fresh app icon options to change how Signal will appear on your home screen Signal Settings Appearance App Icon . The attachment selector has a brand new design that is more compact and easier to use. If you start feeling attached to these improvements right away that s OK because it s thematically appropriate. For those of you who don t like AM or PM it s time to smile. Now when your system settings are configured to display a 24 hour clock the clock stickers in the media editor will be in 24 hour format too.
We fixed a few bugs in the device transfer process just in case anyone is getting ready to announce some new phones soon.

Now you can add stickers to pictures in the media editor to make them truly stick out. Put another bumper sticker on a picture of a car add some sticker shock to a screenshot of Taylor Swift ticket prices or spice up a photo of last night s dinner with a sticker of a pot sticker. And if you happen to live in the village of Sticker in South West England you can find your favorite local wall and attach a sticker to its picture to become a virtual bill sticker in Sticker. Show them the time of your life with new stickers in the media editor that let you add stylized time decorations on outgoing images too.

The Signal iOS dev team may not be able to help you emotionally deal with the overwhelming weight of your own popularity but we can fix a few more bugs that only affected people with extremely large contact lists.

Every search result should feel like a highlight but a bug was preventing the yellow highlight markers from being displayed for matches in individual chats unless the search result appeared in a message that also included a spoiler effect. Spoiler: That bug dies at the end of this update.
This update fixes a couple of bugs related to mentions. Thanks to AlexLucasBklyn on GitHub for their help!

Night Shyamalan a twist ending with a spoiler effect emphasize a name by writing Alex in italics put a line through a rejected dinner idea with strikethrough or share code in monospace.
Think fast. Improve your reaction time when replying to a Signal story. Now you can quickly scroll through recent emoji and send a reaction to someone s story right away.

Message reactions now support the latest emoji so you can express your disbelief with Shaking Face or react with a Pea Pod when someone asks you how close you are to your friends. We added a new and optional List mode in the All Media view. If you decide to go off the grid now you can see more info at a glance including file names file sizes dates etc.
If you ve experienced bugs around chat color settings that made you want to use colorful language we swear they re probably fixed.

Quickly spot your favorites in the attachment selector. If you ve given your heart to a picture or a video in the Photos app that symbol of your love will now appear in Signal too.

Emoji search improvements make it easier to find the right way to say I love you using whatever heart shaped emoji best matches the state of your own heart. Photos in the attachment selector are now sorted based on how recently they were added to your device. Go ahead and download an old meme and share it with a new friend. We d like to express our sincere appreciation to skjiisa for developing these features and submitting some of the best GitHub Pull Requests we ve seen so far.

If you decide to go off the grid now you can see more info at a glance including file names file sizes dates etc. This release also includes several performance improvements and startup speed enhancements. If you have a lot of large conversations or a lot of messages we hope that you ll notice a little difference.

For those of you who like to listen closely we improved earpiece proximity detection on newer iPhones. Now you can call someone without accidentally hanging up on them with your cheek as often and you can also quietly play new voice notes without the screen shining in your ear too. The media player looks a lot better in landscape mode and we repositioned common playback controls so that things don t feel so sideways even when your device is sideways. If someone mentions you in a reply to a group story you ll get notified as expected. We added support for line wraps for long profile names and now the entire name will appear instead of being partially truncated with an ellipsis. You can still deliberately include an ellipsis in your profile name if you want to be Mysterious
We searched for a way to improve search performance so now you can find the right chat without needing to find as much patience.

Now you can quickly see how many images or videos will be included when you forward an album and you can also choose to cancel the process and wait for a WiFi connection before re sharing 47 pictures from a recent birthday party. If today is your birthday happy birthday from Signal.

Hot on the heels of their introduction in the last release the fast forward and rewind icons for long videos have been updated to look slightly fast er and a bit more rewind er. Long captions in the media viewer can now be expanded with a tap which lets you see more of the image if your friend sends a picture worth a thousand words with a rambling caption that s also a thousand words.

Share more things from more places. The share extension now has better support for the text format that various popular news apps share by default. We also squashed a bug that sometimes caused your first attempt to fail when sharing something. Speaking of sharing another bug was making it difficult to share text content from other apps like Apple Notes as Signal Stories. Text has arguably been an important component of some of the best stories throughout history so we re excited to close the chapter on this particular problem. New animation improvements in the media and avatar viewers let you smoothly step back and see the big picture. We fixed a couple of layout issues that could cause buttons to show up in the wrong place on new iPhones like invisible castaways marooned underneath Apple s Dynamic Island. This update also includes support for Cantonese and Uyghur.

Even though the Find by Phone Number feature is now more than 4x faster you can still take your time when you decide to start a new conversation. We fixed a few bugs including one that sometimes caused the text input field to be displayed incorrectly when replying to a story.

If you routinely miss calls when your phone is in another room you ll be happy to hear that unread missed call events in individual non group chats will be automatically marked as read when you answer or decline on the 2nd or 3rd or 27th attempt. Sometimes persistence pays off for everyone involved especially if one of your friends is accidentally going for the pocket dial world record. We fixed a few bugs including one that occasionally made part of the interface look transparent while browsing through your contact list. Now you can only metaphorically see right through some of the people you know.

We improved the way that information about incoming outgoing and missed calls is displayed and synchronized across linked devices. Now you can make the right call about all of the calls you didn t answer in time. The All Media view has been optimized to let you scroll through the past much faster in the future. Performance enhancements for audio calls in low bandwidth environments will help you stay connected to a great conversation even when your connection isn t great.

This feeling of confidence was inside you the whole time. Add captions to your attachments before you send them. The best attachments are the ones that require an explanation. We said farewell to the following bugs: Tapping on images in the media view would sometimes cause them to move around a bit before the navigation bars disappeared. Images now remain frozen in place as the glorious darkness of the full screen media view surrounds them. The initial hourglass rendering that is displayed underneath each Disappearing Message had a pixel that was out of place. Even when they re only tiny dots on a screen every single grain of sand is important. The VoiceOver accessibility feature in iOS no longer stops working after recording a voice memo. Real people don t flicker. Now the profile avatars that represent those people don t flicker either. Signal calls that are placed on speakerphone from the lock screen will now correctly indicate that the speakerphone is active in the app as well. A rare issue could occur with the disappearing message timer on a newly linked Signal Desktop device but that s not the world we live in anymore. Messages would sometimes disappear if you were looking at the info screen when a read receipt arrived. The app would become unresponsive if you tried to send a photo after denying Signal access to your photo library. Some characters that used to look strange in lock screen notifications now look totally normal. You d never even suspect that anything about them is different. If you killed the app at precisely the right moment you might find yourself unable to message certain users. This game of chance was difficult to play and the victory prize wasn t very fun so we decided to get rid of it. Signal is made for you. Thank you for your feedback and support. We are hiring.
